title: Ticket #484: Memory size incorrect for libvirt-based VMs
description: Condor stores the memory for a VM in the job ad in megabytes, but the libvirt VM configuration file expects the memory in kilobytes. The VM GAHP isn't converting the job ad value as it should. Matt fixed this in 7.3, but the problem has now been noticed in 7.2.
